address: via di Santa Maria de' Calderari 49
description: This gourmet fine-dining restaurant, the brainchild of the South African designer Tristan Du Plessis, has arrived in the Italian capital where it’s overseen by chef Alessandro Pietropaoli. Here, choose from the à la carte or opt for one of the tasting menus (5 or 7 courses). Elegant, contemporary and cosmopolitan cuisine.
facilitiesServices: Air conditioning, Restaurant offering vegetarian menus
